response.overview: In early 20th-century Montana, Col. William Ludlow lives on a ranch in the wilderness with his sons, Alfred, Tristan, and Samuel. Eventually, the unconventional but close-knit family are bound by loyalty, tested by war, and torn apart by love, as told over the course of several decades in this epic saga.
response.tagline: After the Fall from Innocence the Legend begins.
response.title: Legends of the Fall

results.name: Legends of the Fall (1994) Original Trailer [FHD]
